programme.title: The Guardian
programme.desc: The Guardian Cities has grown from a small experiment into a huge community. Together we have tried to shape how the world understands urbanisation: namely, as one of the truly transformative global phenomena of the 21st century.

programme.title: Cancer Town
programme.desc: A year-long series from Reserve, Louisiana, where the risk of cancer is 50 times the national average for the United States. This series of reports will ask what residents have to do to win the right to a safe environment for their children.

programme.title: Pretty radical: a young woman's journey into the heart of Poland's far right
programme.desc: We follow 19-year-old Paulina, who joins Poland's far-right National Radical Camp. She is quickly selected as a candidate in local elections because she's ‘a pretty young woman' who might improve the image of an organisation thought to be full of ‘bald hooligans vandalising the city'. What drew her to join the nationalist group in the first place? Will anything make her question her loyalty to them?

programme.title: My weekend at man camp: trauma, wrestling and tears | Filthy Pride: Marching for LGBTQ+ rights in Orbán's Hungary
programme.desc: My weekend at man camp: trauma, wrestling and tears | Filthy Pride: Marching for LGBTQ+ rights in Orbán's Hungary

programme.title: Lady of the Gobi
programme.desc: On Mongolia's coal highway to the Chinese border, truck driver Maikhuu dreams of a better life and financial security for her three children. However, the road from the mines to China is riddled with accidents, toxic pollution, poor hygiene and now, amid the Covid crisis, drivers face days of quarantine on the border. Trapped in a hazardous industry, Maikhuu's journey reflects the human and environmental costs of Mongolia's mining boom.

programme.title: America's soccer migrants: the US footballers crossing Mexico's border
programme.desc: Despite President Donald Trump's rhetoric about Mexicans crossing the border to the US, American soccer players such as Omar Gonzalez are heading south for new opportunities, more money and a better standard of football. The Guardian travels to Pachuca, Torreón and Guadalajara to speak to top clubs, US immigrant players and Mexico legend Jared Borgetti – who find the prospect of a border wall at odds with the reality of the two nations' interdependent relationship

programme.title: Lord of the Rain: one man's fight against climate catastrophe
programme.desc: Doyte lives in South Omo, Ethiopia, one of the most remote areas in the world and hard hit by the climate crisis. As Lord of the Rain, it's Doyte's job to summon the rains, but for five years they haven't come. Ethiopia's economy is booming, fuelled by green power and climate-resilient policies. But neither the government, nor Doyte, can reverse the catastrophic change that's devastating their environment

programme.title: The "Spider-Man" of Sudan: the real-life superhero of the protest movement
programme.desc: In Sudan's capital, Khartoum, an anonymous protester dressed as Spider-Man joins the hundreds of thousands of protesters desperate to protect their fragile civilian government after the military coup in October 2021. 'Spidey' has become well known on social media for leaping from billboards and scaling the tops of buildings while dodging teargas. However, it's his work with some of the poorest children in Khartoum that has shown him to be a positive focus for the resistance, helping a new generation to know their worth and take pride in their country's rich heritage.

programme.title: Buyers Club
programme.desc: In 2013, a cure was found for hepatitis C. It could save millions of lives, but its price tag of between $40,000 and $84,000 for 84 pills puts it far out of most patients' reach. However, in India, a generic version of the drug is available for less than $1,000. Denied the affordable medication he needed, Greg Jefferys defied the US pharmaceutical company that holds the patent to set up a worldwide supply network for the generic version.

programme.title: After Windrush – Paulette Wilson's visit to Jamaica, 50 years on
programme.desc: A letter from the British government classifying Paulette Wilson as an illegal immigrant shook her sense of identity and belonging. ‘Hostile environment' policies years in the making meant that Wilson and other victims of the Windrush scandal had their right to residency in the UK called into question. She had been detained for a week pending imminent deportation though she had done nothing wrong. It was devastating, but luckily she was released before she was deported.

programme.title: Erica: man made
programme.desc: Erica is 23. She has a beautiful, neutral face and speaks with a synthesised voice. She has a degree of autonomy – but can't move her hands yet. Hiroshi Ishiguro is her ‘father' and the bad boy of Japanese robotics. Together they will redefine what it means to be human and reveal that the future is closer than we might think.

programme.title: The County
programme.sub-title: what happens after police kill someone you love?
programme.desc: When someone dies after an encounter with law enforcement, he leaves behind parents and children, loss and confusion. What's to be done when those people sworn to protect you are the same people who pull the trigger?

programme.title: 'Revenge pornography': Chrissy Chambers' search for justice
programme.desc: In April, it became a crime in England and Wales to post ‘revenge pornography'. Chrissy Chambers and her girlfriend Bria are YouTube's most popular lesbian content creators. The two channels they run have almost half a million subscribers. But before Chrissy came out, she had a boyfriend. He also has videos of her. And she says he's using them to destroy her

programme.title: The pig superbug and the baby
programme.desc: How did the antibiotic resistant pig superbug LA-MRSA find its way onto the umbilical cords of new born babies in Glasgow - and onto the shelves of our biggest supermarkets. Watch the Guardian's investigation into how intensive pig farming is accelerating an antibiotic crisis, that will be killing more of us, than cancer by 2050.

programme.title: Is this inclusive? Why only 4% of children's book heroes are BAME
programme.desc: More than 33% of students at UK schools are from black and minority ethnic backgrounds, but only 4% of the protagonists in children's books in the UK are BAME. The publishing industry has made big claims about its push for inclusivity both on and off the page, but some believe progress is painfully slow. Grace Shutti investigates what's taking UK publishing so long and meets some of the creators who are championing change, including the authors of hit books Amazing Grace and Look Up!, and the owners of inclusive publisher Round Table books.

programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: All Between Us
programme.desc: An engaged couple gathers family and friends together. This celebration turns into disaster as secrets surface. One night, one mistake, one dinner unravels the lives of four people forever.

programme.title: All's Faire in Love
programme.desc: Set in the world of a Renaissance Faire, 'All's Faire in Love' is a light-hearted romp, a romantic camp comedy, falling somewhere between 'Shakespeare In Love' and 'Meatballs'. After years of performing together, a rag-tag theatre troupe is about to lose it's prime gig at Ye Olde Times Renaissance Faire when the Faire's owner threatens to hand over their stage to a rival troupe of conceited, classically-trained Shakespearean actors. The gonzo group must revive their act and find help from an unexpected source.

programme.title: Datsche
programme.desc: Valentine, a New York actor, inherits a 'datcha' on a garden allotment in East Germany and goes to spend the summer there. In ist attic he finds Adam, a refugee hiding from deportation. Valentine promises to keep Adam's secret but the arrival of some couchsurfers and a nosy neighbour put their flat share to the test. A summer fairytale about friendships across borders and garden fences.

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Dr. Emma Lloyd (Uma Thurman) is a popular New York radio DJ whose sensible, practical love advice is listened to and loved by women everywhere. Off-air, her own life is equally successful with wedding plans to dependable fiancé Richard (Colin Firth) running smoothly, until that is she makes a chocking discovery: she's already married – and to someone else! With her life turned upside down, Emma franticly sets out to track down the mystery man to annul the marriage. However, as the truth unfolds, she discovers that following her own advice might not be as easy as she thought…

programme.title: Meteor
programme.desc: The U.S. must join forces with the U.S.S.R. in order to destroy a gigantic asteroid heading straight for Earth. Starring: Billy Campbell, Christopher Lloyd and Stacy Keach

programme.title: Meteor

programme.desc: When Bonnie Parker met Clyde Barrow over a cup of hot chocolate, it sparked a legendary story. Their courtship took them through bank robberies, prison and a multi-state crime spree, which secured their place in history.

programme.title: Cell

While Sita is trapped in an arranged relationship with her cruel and unfaithful husband, Jatin (Jaaved Jaafei), Radha is married to his brother, Ashok (Kulbhushan Kharbanda), a religious zealot who believes in suppressing desire. As the two women recognize their similar situations, they grow closer, and t

programme.title: Surviving Love
programme.desc: Jessica Miller is thrust into the "real" world when she graduates from college. To conquer this new world, she must discover her faith, open a box of memories and learn the simple secrets of life only a mother can share.

programme.title: Letters To God
programme.desc: Tyler Doherty is an extraordinary eight-year-old boy. Surrounded by a loving family and community, and armed with the courage of his faith, he faces his daily battle against cancer with bravery and grace. To Tyler, God is a friend, a teacher and the ultimate pen pal-Tyler's prayers take the form of letters, which he composes and mails on a daily basis. The letters find their way into the hands of Brady McDaniels, a beleaguered postman standing at a crossroads in his life. At first, he is confused and conflicted over what to do with the letters. But the decision he ultimately makes becomes a testament to the quiet power of one boy's shining spirit and unshakable faith.

programme.title: Rising Above
programme.desc: After two girls cruelly impersonate her online in a "reverse cyber bullying" plot, Ashley's reputation is ruined and she and her mother flee a growing threat to their lives. Starting over at a new school, romantic interests and the poignant lessons from an eccentric history teacher draw them out of seclusion until they realize confronting a hurtful past is essential to ensure a brighter future.

programme.title: My Birthday Romance
programme.desc: A woman tired of her parents nagging her to find a boyfriend makes a deal with a guy who also doesn't want a relationship to pose as her boyfriend to keep her family off her back until after her birthday party.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A cavalry officer sympathetic to the wronged Sioux fixes a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant but a dishonest Indian Agent and a hateful General Custer test the Sioux's patience, threatening to derail the peace-talks.

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: Three cowboys, mistaken for members of an outlaw gang, are relentlessly pursued by a posse.

programme.title: More Dead Than Alive
programme.desc: Released from prison after 18 years, notorious gunslinger 'Killer' Cain is a peaceful reformed man but the Old West has died and he cannot adapt to the modern West where some unpaid moral debts and old troubles resurface.

programme.title: The Hired Hand
programme.desc: Harry returns home to his wife and farm after drifting with his friend Arch and has to make a difficult decision regarding his loyalties.

programme.desc: CEO of the Morton Pumpkin Company decides to commemorate the anniversary of the cutest town ever founded with a bake-off. The town sweetheart is expected to win. When her niece is left to stay, winning seems out of reach.

programme.desc: When Hayley finds a wedding ring with a letter hidden in a drawer in her new condo, she decides to write back… and the mysterious lover replies, starting a chain of letters and events that will change her life for ever!

programme.title: Coming of Age
programme.desc: Growing up isn't easy. Join us for a season of coming of age shorts, delving into the challenging and enlightening period when children grow into adults.

programme.title: A Whirlwind Wedding
programme.desc: Darcy, a talented event planner returns to her home town to plan her mother's wedding. She's having trouble accepting her stepfather-to-be and quickly Darcy's obsession with perfection begins to clash with her mother's wishes for a low-key celebration —especially when it comes to handsome and charming Kyle, the chef Darcy deems inadequate for catering the event. But as complications arise—both personal and professional—it's Kyle who is able to help her pull off the big day and help her find the love she's been looking for…

programme.title: Once More
programme.desc: From acclaimed director Rob Reiner (When Harry Met Sally) comes a heart-warming, inspirational film about finding yourself again and learning to let others in. Frustrated writer, Monte Wildhorn, takes a lakeside cabin for the summer to rekindle his passion for writing. While there he befriends the family next door who help him to find inspiration again. Starring Academy Award Winner Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Deadly Patient
programme.desc: Dr. Hillary Spenser is known as 'The Angel of the East Wing'. However, a patient mistakes her compassion for adoration, fuelling his obsession to do whatever it takes to fulfil his misguided vision of their future together.

programme.title: Beowulf
programme.desc: In a besieged land, Beowulf must battle against the hideous creature Grendel and his vengeance seeking mother.

programme.title: The Monster Maker
programme.desc: A mad scientist injects his enemies with an acromegaly virus, causing them to become hideously deformed.

programme.title: Smash-Up: The Story Of A Woman
programme.desc: A successful nightclub singer weds a struggling songwriter, but when his fame eclipses hers, she delves into alcoholism.

programme.title: The Duke Is Tops
programme.desc: A theatrical producer puts aside his own success to boost the career of a talented singer.

programme.title: Velo Mysterium
programme.desc: An experimental short film sculpture about the symbiotic relationship between human and bicycle. There are three states of riding a bicycle: The bicycle as a spaceship, as a body machine and as a time machine.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: A young officer in Napoleon's army pursues a mysterious woman to the castle of an elderly Baron.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A group of people hide from bloodthirsty zombies in a farmhouse.

programme.title: Bee Season
programme.desc: An eleven-year-old girl from a dysfunctional family demonstrates a remarkable, almost mystical, gift for spelling when she wins district spelling bees and qualifies for the nationals.

programme.title: Elvis the Early Years
programme.desc: The KING OF ROCK N' ROLL, from his working class life in Memphis, Tennessee to worldwide super-stardom. Sit at the edge of your seat when Elvis struggles to make his great come-back and enjoy all the unforgettable hits.

programme.title: Elvis the Early Years
programme.desc: The KING OF ROCK N' ROLL, from his working class life in Memphis, Tennessee to worldwide super-stardom. Sit at the edge of your seat when Elvis struggles to make his great come-back and enjoy all the unforgettable hits.

programme.title: Memoirs Of An Invisible Man
programme.desc: When a government experiment goes awry it renders an innocent bystander invisible.

programme.title: Hometown Hero
programme.desc: Young divorce lawyer Kelsey finds it safer to keep love out of her life - that is until a stray dog pairs her with Harrison, the local vet.

programme.title: Love on the Vines
programme.desc: When Diana inherits half her uncle's vineyard, she is surprised to find a rule requiring her to work the land with new co-owner Seth or risk losing the land.

programme.title: A Moving Romance
programme.desc: After inheriting her family's moving company, a young woman starts to clash with the manager who thought he was going to take over.

programme.title: Undercover Angel
programme.desc: When a little girl prays for a miracle to help her recently divorced mother settle in their new town and fixer-upper house, an angel posing as a handyman, is sent down from heaven to help. While trying to accomplish his mission, the angel falls for the mother, ultimately forcing him into the unlikeliest of choices.

programme.title: Maria My Love
programme.desc: A young woman named Ana is struggling to deal with her mother's death and her father's mistakes. In an effort to feel better, she reconnects with her half-sister Grace, (Lauren Fales) and, inspired by a new boyfriend (Brian Rieger), sets out on a quest to find someone to help. Though excited and hopeful when she meets an eccentric woman named Maria (Karen Black), she soon discovers Maria is a compulsive hoarder, and is swept up in a situation more emotionally and morally complicated than she had expected to find. Inspired by a true story.

programme.title: Forever In My Heart
programme.desc: Jenna and Charlie found love in Ireland but their dreams drove them apart. Five years later, they reunite and Jenna has to decide where her heart belongs—back home or in the Emerald Isle.

programme.title: Crazy Kind of Love
programme.desc: A newly single mother relies on her son and his carefree girlfriend to rebuild her belief in love, even if it is the crazy kind.

programme.title: The Charm of Love
programme.desc: Art historian Madison “Maddie” TURNER, an expert in ancient artifacts and in deflecting unwanted male attention, travels halfway around the world to the Caribbeans in order to find the legendary "Lovers Stone". On her adventure when she meets Andrew “Fitz” Fitzpatrick, an international hotelier with trust issues and a local's knowledge of the island, her search may lead her to true love after all.

programme.title: Hint of Love
programme.desc: A cookbook literary agent with culinary training is tasked with helping elevate the brand of a food channel personality known for his convenience-oriented recipes. However, as the agent works with her client on a new cookbook, playfully clashing over everything from ingredients to tastes, she must choose between following the directions or her heart.

programme.title: Shadow People
programme.desc: In the 70's, patients reported seeing shadowy intruders and then died asleep. Now, there's a new outbreak.

programme.title: Eva

programme.desc: A bank clerk finds his life suddenly changed after a train accident threatens to reveal his biggest secret.

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Alex, a renowned cybernetic engineer, needs to carry out a very specific mission: create a child robot.

programme.title: My Zoe
programme.desc: An emotionally-engaging, heartbreaking family drama with a dystopian sci-fi twist, starring Julie Delpy (Before Sunrise), Richard Armitage (The Stranger), Gemma Arterton (Summerland) and Daniel Brhl (Captain America: Civil War). Top-level scientist Isabelle is forced to stay in contact with her ex as they are co-parent their daughter and when tragedy strikes she takes matters into her own hands.

programme.title: Some Like it Rare
programme.desc: Your life is at steak in this hilarious French comedy with a dark twist. Sophie and Vincents small butcher shop is on the brink of bankruptcy and their marriage is falling apart. Their lives are turned upside down when Vincent accidentally kills a vegan activist who vandalised their shop. Terrified of being accused of murder, their only solution is to get rid of the body by turning it into ham.

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: Oscar and Golden Globe winners Morgan Freeman, Gene Hackman and Monica Bellucci star in this twisty thriller. From Emmy award winning director Stephen Hopkins and the producers of Fight Club, we follow a wealthy attorney who is accused of the murder of a young girl. Described as an intense psychological punch-up, eye-gouging thriller it is regarded as one of the best movies of all time.

programme.title: Safer at Home
programme.desc: 3 years since COVID-19 ravaged the world and to control mass panic and the virus, LA has become a police state. The message is You are safer at home. To escape reality, a group of friends arrange an online party, with games and drugs on the menu. But the realities of the world come crashing in and the homes they considered safe become a haven to a relentless bloody attack on the senses.

programme.title: An Aurora Teagarden Mystery: Dead Over Heels
programme.desc: A librarian who hosts a murder mystery book club can't help but get involved when a local Detective Sergeant winds up murdered. Stars Candace Cameron Bure, Lexa Doig (2017)

programme.title: Daughter's Deception
programme.desc: A woman reconnects with her long-lost daughter only to discover that she is a murderous sociopath. Starring Jade Harlow (2019)

programme.title: Lost Letter Mysteries: The Road Less Travelled
programme.desc: The Postables take on a road trip to track down a boy who may have been kidnapped. Starring Eric Mabius (2016)

programme.desc: Whilst on a 17th century archaeology dig, Emma uncovers a body which leads her into a modern-day murder mystery. (2017)

programme.title: Love At First Dance
programme.desc: Hope is tasked with teaching Manhattan's most eligible bachelor how to dance ahead of his society wedding. Will their blossoming student-teacher relationship ultimately jeopardise the wedding? (2018)

programme.title: The Wedding Fix
programme.desc: Recently single Gwen helps to plan her best friend's wedding, aided by best man, Josh.

programme.title: The Wedding Arrangement

programme.title: SAILING INTO LOVE

programme.title: Love At First Dance
programme.desc: Hope is tasked with teaching Manhattan's most eligible bachelor how to dance ahead of his society wedding. Will their blossoming student-teacher relationship ultimately jeopardise the wedding? (2018)

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In a future where time is literally money and aging stops at 25, the only way to stay alive is to earn, steal, or inherit more time. Will Salas lives minute-to-minute, until a windfall of time gives him access to the world of the wealthy, where he teams up with a beautiful young heiress to destroy the corrupt system.

programme.title: Karate-do: The Path of Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: She is not a dragon, though in the dojo you'd swear otherwise. This is Sandra Sánchez, and she's going down in history as one of the greatest karate has ever seen. This is the story of her unique path. Her 'Do'. A winding story of playing at karate as a child, to navigating an abusive relationship as an adult, and concluding in her unbelieveable and record-smashing penultimate year competing in the three most prestigious karate championships, and winning all three. Success is never an easy path, but at the Tokyo Olympics Sandra fought for - and against - many struggles, as she claimed her place in history.

programme.title: Waiting for Anya
programme.desc: From the mind of world-renowned author Michael Morpurgo comes the cinematic adaptation of Waiting for Anya - a powerful and authentic true story of a young shepherd that had a key part to play in one of the world's most shocking moments in history. Based on the novel by the author of War Horse, Waiting for Anya follows the story of Jo Lalande, a thirteen-year-old shepherd living in the mountain village of Lescun. Though Europe may be ravaged by the horrors of World War II, Jo's world in the French Pyrenees has remained remarkably untouched.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: In this live action movie-length version of the famous four, The Evil Shredder has returned to cause more mayhem and kidnaps the rat Ninja Master. But the Turtles have been armed with Professor Perry's Anti Mutant antidote and, with the help of a journalist, embark on an adventure to save the Ninja Master.

programme.title: Slipaway
programme.desc: When a homeless young musician moves into a sailboat with a feisty elderly widow, the two must overcome their differences and haunting pasts to unlock each other's dreams.

programme.title: Life With Music
programme.desc: In this life affirming story of hope, acclaimed pianist, Henry (Patrick Stewart) finds himself afflicted with a severe case of stage fright. After a fateful meeting with a free-spirited music critic (Katie Holmes), Henry begins to find inspiration and learns to let go of his past. Also starring Giancarlo Esposito ( The Mandalorian', 'Breaking Bad').

programme.title: Five Nights in Maine
programme.desc: A man, reeling from the tragic loss of his wife, travels to rural Maine to seek answers from his estranged mother-in-law, who is herself confronting grief. With David Oyelowo and Dianne Wiest.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: The film stars Academy Award® nominee Kate Hudson (Almost Famous), Tony and Grammy Award winner Leslie Odom Jr. (Hamilton) and Sia-protégé and breakout star Maddie Ziegler as well as Juliette Lewis (Natural Born Killers) and Ben Schwartz (Parks and Recreation). MUSIC follows a ‘newly sober woman (Hudson) figuring out her place in the world when she learns she is to become the sole guardian of her half-sister, Music (Ziegler), a young girl on the autism spectrum. MUSIC is about the magic that can happen when someone who cannot speak with words finds people who can listen with their hearts.

programme.title: The Untold Story
programme.desc: In every person's life, there is a moment when we discover what true success is. Edward is learning that lesson later in life, but thankfully not too late. Edward finds hope and inspiration in what he considered unlikely sources. Catarina, his fiery new neighbor, is as straightforward as they come and shows Edward that pretending to be something isn't the same as actually being it…and this chance meeting finally gives his life meaning.

programme.title: Invasion Planet Earth
programme.desc: After the death of his young daughter, Tom Dunn is a broken man. When his wife falls pregnant again, he cannot believe their luck. However, his joy is short-lived, as, on the very same day, the people of Earth become plagued with terrifying visions of the end of the world. When a gigantic, all-consuming alien mothership appears in the sky and launches a ruthless attack on Earth's cities, chaos and destruction follow. Tom must find the strength and wisdom to save his wife and unborn child. However, first he must confront a shocking truth. A truth which threatens the key to the survival of the human race. The ultimate war for Planet Earth is about to begin...

programme.title: Robot Overlords
programme.desc: The adults lost the war and now the kids must save the world! Robots rule the streets and the people are locked in their homes. Stepping outside risks being vaporised by a hulking Sentry or picked off by a lethal Sniper. Through the ruins of Britain a group of kids, led by Callan McAuliffe, set out to join the Resistance. Hot on their heels however is their old teacher turned robot collaborator Mr Smythe, played by Ben Kingsley and his captive Gillian Anderson. Robot Overlords is a bombastic British blockbuster, packed with incredible special effects and rebellious excitement for all ages.

programme.title: Tracers
programme.desc: It's a race for survival in the criminal underworld of New York in the action-packed thriller TRACERS. Cam is down on his luck, drowning in debt and living in a garage, he's desperate for an out. When he meets the beautiful and mysterious Nikki, it looks like all his problems have been solved. She introduces him to her underground world where the risks are high and the money is easy. But when the gang takes on a new target, what was once a game soon becomes a case of life and death."

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
programme.desc: The Turtles have been forced to move in with their friend the news reporter April O'Neil, because the Foot Clan knows the whereabouts of their lair in the sewers. While the Turtles are looking for a new home, they encounter a pizza delivery boy, Keno, who is trying to fight off a band of robbers. The Turtles intervene and help him. The turtles learn that Shredder is not dead and that he is searching for the green ooze that created them. Shredder hopes to create a group of mutant animals to use against the turtles. So the turtles have to prove again that they are the better ninja fighters.

programme.title: The Ex-Files
programme.desc: Sarah struggles with conflict, instead she runs away from her problems leaving them unresolved. This is a learnt behavior that stems from her parent's divorce running from one parent to another and playing them against each other. This is quite common in kids from broken families, it is used as a source of power and a way of getting what they want. In Sarah's case this behavior has led her into a messy love triangle.

programme.title: The Ex-Files
programme.desc: Carly has recently undergone a huge physical transformation but her self-esteem is yet to catch up, she constantly compares herself to other women. This is becoming more and more common everyday, women and men comparing themselves to everyday people on carefully curated social media accounts and subsequently doubting themselves. Carly needs to really see her beauty, believe it and stop comparing herself to other people.

programme.title: The Ex-Files
programme.desc: Since falling pregnant at the young age of 21, Amber has formed an extremely close bond with her mother. Becoming a mother is one of the most physical and psychological changes a woman will ever experience – new mothers often struggle with losing their identity and independence, it's called the silent wall – the process of slowly fading away from themselves and their interests. In Amber's case, becoming a mother so young made it even more difficult, as she was still yet to discover who she was as an adult. Amber's lack of independence it seems is now affecting her relationships, it's time for her to regain her identity.

programme.title: The Ex-Files
programme.desc: Lyndal has unrealistic expectations of what a relationship should look and feel like. With the onslaught of dating apps, millennials have become addicted to that early feeling of excitement in the early stages of a relationship, and they are less likely to put in the hard work that comes after. Lyndal needs to reframe what a relationship looks like and be brave enough to go after what she wants.

programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an “independent study” – he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles – which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together – and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: A Little Rusty
programme.desc: The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro unlocks a mysterious Forbidden Power. What kind ofhavoc will they unleash? And can Merlok 2.0 and the NEXO KNIGHTS make the new COMBO NEXO Powers work? The Knights finally make it to the Lava Lands – using their various new forms of transport, which are all strictly civilian vechicles – and they must regroup and learn to fight together again to face the new threat of Jestro, the Cloud of Monstrox, and their STONE MONSTERS (in this case, Stone Gargoyles.) But Jestro and his monsters beat back the knights and recover the STAFF OF MONSTROX – which was buried under the ceremonial chamber from Episode 210 (and is now the Lava Puker amusement park ride) – and they get away on Jestro's EVIL MOBILE, which he recovers from the HQ garage. Macy says this is exactly why she's been touring the kingdom preparing everyone for the next attack. The Knights have to get it together because now the entire kingdom is under threat…again. Robin decides he must upgrade the Knights' vehicles and make them more “fight optimized.” Ava and Merlok 2.0 must figure out how to use new NEXO Powers because regular NEXO Powers do make Stone monsters back into stone, but the Cloud simply zaps them to life again. Meanwhile, in the IRON MOUNTAINS, Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find the first of the Forbidden Powers: RELENTLESS RUST. They find the ROGUL STATUE holding the power and zap him to life. Now…they can rust those shiny knights to pieces! Ava and Merlok are attempting to use NEXO COMBO POWERS – with hilarious results – as they try to figure out how they might work. When Jestro attacks, he's able to halt the Fortrex by instantly rusting its tracks and wheels! Robin has his hands full trying to clean all the rust from the attack of Relentless Rust. As the Knights attempt to defend against Jestro, the Cloud is zapping statues to life. He hits a statue with a bolt of lightning as Clay is touching it. Something happens…Clay feels odd stiff as if rock is mixing with his body. Finally, Ava and Merlok 2.0 download to the Knights their new thing: a COMBO NEXO COMBO Power. It works! It can smash the animated statues to dust! They use it to defeat Jestro, but he and the Cloud get away with the Forbidden Power of Relentless Rust. Victory … sort of. Clay talks to Merlok 2.0…something has happened to him. What can they do? Merlok 2.0 is very concerned.

programme.title: Thunderstox
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounter…THE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro to…MOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that?” asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statue…it's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. And…it's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can't…it had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robin…he will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Weekend At Halberts
programme.desc: Party time in Knighton! The mood is down so the King decides to throw a party. In the meantime Jestro attacks the Fortrex, but he is confronted with the new NEXO Power "The Wedgie of Doom". Clay is turned to stone and everyone is gloomy. Especially King Halbert. In order to get everything in a better mood Aaron organizes a celebration. The King wants a reenactment of Clay's heroic rescue of the Queen. He is (as usual) totally unaware of Clay's situation. In order not to disappoint him further, the Knights get a remote control for Clay's Battle suit and is thus able to “perform” as Clay. Lance is happy to exercise his acting abilities and quickly gets into the role of the uptight knight of knights. Ava is working on reinstalling Merlok 2.0 into the Fortrex with Robin. She is also preparing the Fortrex for a visit from the new Knights' Academy novices. It is a fieldtrip with Principal Brickland and Sir Griffiths with the goal of teaching the kids about these new so-called High-tech battle strategies. Not really feeling it for anything modern, it quickly turns into a regular trip back memory lane for Brickland and Sir Griffiths. This out of control excursion is an excellent moment for Jestro who is looking for an opportunity to cheer up the defeated Monstrox. Unfortunately, for Jestro, Ava is able to make Merlok 2.0 functional again, and the Novices are able to fight Jestro and his monsters off using the NEXO Power: Wedgie of Doom. It is a humiliating defeat. Apparently, this is just what the doctor ordered for Monstrox. A good laugh at someone else's expense. His evil mood is back on.

programme.title: The Gray Knight
programme.desc: Using his Stone to Life magic the Cloud of Monstrox turns Clay into a living, fighting, breathing stone fighting knight. But will Clay use his forces to fight for good or for evil? Does he have a choice? The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro are able to unlock the forbidden Power Shocking Scare and unleash an attack on the village of Bravington. Knights in their new vehicles rush to the rescue and are able to defeat him with a new Combo Power. In the heat of the battle, the Cloud of Monstrox sees the stone statue of Clay and zaps him to life! Clay is now turned, and is fighting against his friends. It is impossible for them to defeat him without destroying him for good. The Cloud urges Clay on. He attacks the Fortrex in order to get to Merlok. Robin in his Black Knight Mech is trying to stop him, but to no avail. Merlok 2.0 is left undefended. At the very last moment Merlok 2.0 unleashes a blasting spell that sends Clay far far away.

programme.title: Stiix and Stones
programme.desc: The Ninja travel to the Village of Stiix to find the thief who stole the scroll of Airjitzu, but the self-serving Ronan isn't keen to sell it cheaply so the Ninja must figure out a way to make money on the docks – and when they fail to make enough cash, the Ninja decide to steal it – but have a run in with Moro and Sowlarcha. The Ninja travel to the Village of Stiix to find the thief who stole the scroll of Airjitzu, but when the self-serving Ronan isn't keen to sell it cheaply, the Ninja must figure out a way to make money on the docks. Meanwhile, reluctant to give up being Samurai X, Nya struggles to embrace being a Water Ninja, and Sensei Wu gives her a riddle to figure out. Back at Stiix, when the Ninja fail to make enough cash working the docks, the Ninja decide to steal it... but have a run in with Moro and Sowlarcha. After Moro gets away with the scroll, the Ninja are left dangling, but Ronan saves them at a price – for a piece of their share in the Tea Farm.

programme.title: Public Enemy Number One
programme.desc: The Ninja must find out as much as they can about Nadakhan before he finds the Realm Crystal to save his crew, but after the Ninja are labeled enemies by the world they used to protect, our heroes find themselves hunted by their old friend, Ronan. With the Destiny's Bounty impounded, the police hire Ronin to track down the fugitive ninja. Misako has been arrested and is confronted by Nadakhan, who reveals he has trapped Wu in the Teapot of Tyrahn. Misako accidentally reveals the location of the Realm Crystal. The ninja discover that Wu was researching djinn when he disappeared and split up to learn more about their potential new foe. Lloyd and Zane head to the Library of Domu. While there, Ronin hacks into Zane's systems and shuts him down, then captures Lloyd. Ronin uses Zane's SOS beacon to lure Kai and Nya into the desert, where they are captured. Later, Cole and Jay are defeated by Ronin as well. Meanwhile, Nadakhan has used his powers to foil the high-tech security guarding the Realm Crystal and steals it. The ninja are hauled off to Kryptarium Prison and Nadakhan is free to gather his lost crew.

programme.title: Enkrypted
programme.desc: Falsely imprisoned, the Ninja are at their lowest point, but find an unlikely friend in an old enemy. Meanwhile, Nadakhan rescues his marooned crew and gains a new perspective, along with a new mysterious plan. With the ninja imprisoned, Nadakhan uses the Realm Crystal to free his old crew. The ninja encounter Captain Soto, the first captain of the Destiny's Bounty, who tells them the story of how he originally trapped Nadakhan in the Teapot.The secret, he says, is the venom of a Tiger Widow, a rare creature that lives on only one island. The venom can slow a djinn down. Soto is the only one who knows where the island is and will only tell if the ninja break him out of jail. Meanwhile, Nadakhan has decided to return to his home realm of Djinjago, only to discover it is falling apart. The ninja's destruction of the Cursed Realm is affecting the realms connected to it. Nadakhan uses the Djinn Blade to smash the Teapot, absorbing all the spirits that were trapped there into the sword.Nadakhan vows revenge on the ninja and NINJAGO. The ninja and Soto escape from jail, only to find out the map to the island is on Nadakhan's ship. Nadakhan discovers that Nya looks just like Delara, his long-lost love.

programme.title: Misfortune Rising
programme.desc: The Ninja are on a collision course to find the map to stop Nadakhan, they first must find him. Meanwhile, Jay makes a wish to change his future, but it could alter his past indefinitely. The ninja's search for Nadakhan's ship turns up nothing. Nadakhan's crew is struggling to handle an airship which used to sail only on the oceans. Nadakhan confronts Jay and talks him into making a wish that will win him Nya. Jay wishes that he wasn't born in a junkyard and was rich. The next moment, he receives a letter saying his father has died and he has inherited his estate. Jay rushes home to find his parents in the junkyard and finds out they are fine, but they reveal that he is adopted. Jay discovers that his real father is the actor who played his favorite movie hero. In an effort to trap the ninja, the Sky Pirates start raids all over NINJAGO City. Nadakhan kidnaps Kai, who makes two wishes, both of which go wrong. His third wish is to “make it all go away.” Nadakhan's first mate, Flintlocke, accidentally destroys the Realm Crystal and Cole steals Soto's map. The Destiny's Bounty mysteriously vanishes from the police impound yard.

programme.title: The Hands Of Time
programme.desc: Master Wu mistakenly tries to single-handedly complete a battle he began decades ago against Acronix, one of the twin Hands of Time. But the arrival of the first Time Blade – a weapon with the power to speed up time – sends the Ninja to the Monastery just in time to rescue their master from certain doom.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sideshow Smurfs: Clumsy and Smurfette are captured by the wicked Bombast, who plans to exhibit them in his sideshow. Papa Smurf hurries to their rescue and using the bungling Gargamel for interference is able to rescue his Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Blue Plague: Brainy Smurf has decided to dedicate himself to the wellbeing of his fellow Smurfs. He is going to cure them of all ills… With a little help from the evil Gargamel!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Flying Bed: Gargamel casts a spell on Papa's new bed so anyone who sleeps in it is transported to the location of his dream. The drowsy Smurfs' fantasies lead them to a private ship, a castle and finally to Gargamel's. They escape when Clumsy falls asleep and dreams of home.

programme.title: The Gallant Smurf
programme.desc: Queen Felicity will not let her son, Prince Godfrey, marry his sweetheart Pricilla. What she wants as a daughter-in-law is a girl who shows her something she's never seen before. When Hogatha learns of this, and also discovers the existence of Grandpa Smurf, she feels confident that she can surprise the Queen with her capture. Of course, Hogatha must first capture Grandpa Smurf...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Petrified Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's done it again. This time, in front of Papa Smurf, too. He has recited a spell that changes everything to stone. Everything including himself and all the Smurfs and the Village, and the forest around for miles... Fortunately, Peewit appears....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette For A Day: Hefty dresses like Smurfette to lure an enamored gnome, Piltkin, away from the Smurf Village. They burrow underground and meet a female gnome who falls in love with Piltkin who then casts Smurfette aside for his new heartthrob.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Marco Smurf And The Pepper Pirates: The Smurfs sail off in their sailing boat to save Marco Smurf, who has been captured at sea by Captain Pepper. Marina and a dolphin help to free Marco.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tis The Season To Be Smurfy: This is Wild Smurf's first Christmas, and he's impressed by the decorations in the Village of the Smurfs. But Grandpa and Sassette are going to teach him the real meaning of Christmas when they help an old couple to live the most beautiful Christmas they've ever seen...

programme.title: Harmony Steals The Show
programme.desc: Harmony unwittingly signs a contract with Ghost Writer for a symphony that imprisons him in a ghostly nightclub for life! Papa Smurf demands a jury trial with ghostly jurors and a judge that finds Harmony innocent and Ghost Writer guilty of plagiarism.

programme.title: The Smurfs' Firebrigade
programme.desc: The Smurf village institutes a fire brigade to battle the flames in Greedy's kitchen only to discover that Gargamel has taken all of their water. Not realizing the weakness of his dam, Gargamel and Azrael are washed away when it breaks and floods the Smurf village, extinguishing the fire.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Born Rotten: As the Smurfs prepare for the Festival of the Stars, Gargamel plants a creature in their midst that smells so rotten that he can easily be traced to the Smurf village. Papa Smurf realizes that Born Rotten is from another planet, and he instructs Feathers to return him to his home before Gargamel finds them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Hug For Grouchy: Grouchy learns that emotions can be great, particularly after the villainess of Chlorhydris creates a heart of ice to magically drain every one of care and love.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sand Witch: A swamp monster kidnaps Baby as a gift for a witch. The witch, who thinks no one loves her, is amazed when Baby shows affection. When Papa comes to rescue Baby, he makes the witch understand that the loyal swamp monster has always loved her.

programme.title: The Magic Earrings
programme.desc: Hogatha manages to obtain the magic golden earrings of Sonoria that will enable her to hear Smurfy voices from afar. Following Lazy's snores, she almost reaches the Smurf Village until Harmony's horn-blasts blow in her earrings and she flies home in a rage.

programme.title: The Smurfs And The Money Tree
programme.desc: The wicked wizard Gargamel has come up with yet another diabolical plan with the help of his mother, who isn't much nicer than him. He wants to tempt the Smurfs with money of which they have no notion. Will Greedy take the bait?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfs At Sea: Papa Smurf recalls Dreamy's exciting voyage on the high seas and his gripping adventures with sea turtles, whales, desert islands... and pirates!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Miracle Smurfer: The Smurfs learn that the mind is more powerful than matter when they are fooled by a quack's outrageously expensive miracle tonic. But Papa Smurf cures the Smurfs of their temporary naiveté and the charlatan of his villainy.

programme.title: Gospel Singing
programme.desc: All the Teletubbies pop up to say hello. The Teletubbies see a girl whose mother is a very good singer. Four happy Teletubbies dance around Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Grand Old Duke of York
programme.desc: The Teletubbies join in with the game when a voice trumpet sings the Grand Old Duke of York. The magic windmill brings a musical transmission featuring King Pleasure and The Biscuit Boys. And when Po plays a special drum, something magic happens in Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Guessing Game
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children have fun playing a guessing game. A book appears in Teletubbyland and Laa-Laa loves to count the rabbits.

programme.title: Gymnastics
programme.desc: The Teletubbies have fun creeping round the column in Home Hill before watching some children doing gymnastics. Laa-Laa plays catch ball indoors with the other Teletubbies, but the Noo-Noo catches the ball first.

programme.title: Haymaking
programme.desc: The Teletubbies pop up to say hello. The Teletubbies watch some children making hay. A tree appears in Teletubbyland and the Noo-Noo tidies up all the Teletubbies favourite things.

programme.title: Herding Sheep
programme.desc: Some voice trumpets rise to wish the Tubbies good morning. The Teletubbies watch some children herding sheep. The Teletubbies go in and out, and up and down, round the corner and along to top until it is time for Tubby Custard.

programme.title: Hey Diddle Diddle
programme.desc: A voice trumpet brings a message for Dipsy and Laa-Laa which makes them laugh and run away. The Teletubbies watch some children dancing with King Pleasure and the Biscuit Boys.

programme.title: Hickory Dickory Dock
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children dancing while King Pleasure and the Biscuit Boys play Hickory Dickory Dock. A voice trumpet appears and sings Hickory Dickory Dock.

programme.title: How Things Swim
programme.desc: Andy Brown and some children visit and aquarium to learn how things swim in the water. The Teletubbies play an in and out game when a cloud appears in Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Humpty Dumpty
programme.desc: The Teletubbies join in with the game when a voice trumpet sings Humpty Dumpty. The magic windmill brings a musical transmission featuring King Pleasure and the Biscuit Boys. Po has a falling down day. The Teletubbies count up to one and make up a falling down dance.

programme.title: Going on a Train
programme.desc: The Teletubbies love to play slide games. They stop when it is time to watch some children go on a train journey. Po loves to ride her scooter, but one day it rolls away and Po chases it all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Going to School by Boat
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch how some children who live on an island go to school by boat. A voice trumpet appears in Teletubbyland and the Teletubbies play a game called here and there.

programme.title: Good Morning
programme.desc: The Teletubbies finish up their toast in time to see Alex Pascall and some children go for a walk and sing Good Morning to everyone they meet. All the Teletubbies wanted to play with Dipsy, but Dipsy wants to dance.

In this sun-soaked adventure documentary, we are invited to join a holiday with friends, who reunite to shoot the breeze and to do what they love the most: surf.

programme.title: Champions
programme.desc: Carmen Arce, "Kubalita", goalkeeper of the first division Spain women's team, heads to Barcelona to meet UEFA Champions League and UEFA Super Cup winner Alexia Putellas and Viktoria Adrianova, both FC Barcelona players. Before the meeting, Alexia opens up about how her ambition has matured during her career, Viky recalls her injury and Kubalita remembers women's football overcoming barriers at a time when it was underestimated politically and in the media. Together, they explore how the game is perceived in the present day.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Starting Over
programme.desc: In August 2020, Olympic artistic swimmer Ona Carbonell became a first time mother, an experience that reshaped her life overnight. At the same time, Ona embarked on an ambitious plan to compete at the Tokyo Olympics. The documentary follows Ona during these intense 11 months, where she must push the limits to extraordinary degrees both physically and emotionally. Up close to Ona, we share her everyday routines and challenges, from breastfeeding and playing with baby Kai to the intense training sessions with the National Spanish Team.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year's favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team's number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: Champions
programme.desc: Carolina Morace, in Rome, reveals herself as a woman of character, unafraid to be the first woman in any feat, such as the first to score four goals at Wembley Stadium. We meet Barbara Bonansea, Juventus player elected FIFA FIFPro Women's World 11 2020, with her family including her grandmother, who supported her in her desire to be a footballer. US Sassuolo youngster Benedetta Orsi talks optimistically about how she overcame the illness that forced her to give up tennis but gave her the opportunity to develop her passion for football.

programme.title: SEVE
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Enter the world of nocturnal animals... Living your life at night can present extreme challenges - and massive opportunities. In this world without light, danger lurks around every corner. This episode takes us into a world we can barely see - but for many animals it is all they know. Primates like owls, hyenas with super senses and insects that glow have evolved to succeed in this world without light. Whether it's finding food, searching for a mate, or battling off predators, in this murky world only the strongest - and smartest - will survive. In the jungles of Madagascar a secretive relative of the hedgehog communicates through noises produced by it's spines. On the dusty plains of southern Africa a fierce trio of honey badgers fends off a ravenous hyena. Deep in a cave in an isolated part of New Zealand an underground lightshow is produced by millions of tiny insects. And on the coast of Chile, a bat emerges from it's roost. It's time to eateat - and it only feeds on blood... These are just some of the species featured in the third episode. As darkness descends these nocturnal animals have found their own place in a world without light. They've adapted to life in the dark, from finding a mate, to overcoming life's biggest challenges, these creatures have developed some extraordinary skills. They've found their own way to survive - and thrive - when the sun goes down Even when facing seemingly impossible odds animals can still win their fight for survival.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Meet the creatures uniquely adapted to life in the deep freeze. Animals have evolved to live on every corner of the planet - but none are as resilient as those who live in the coldest climes. We'll reveal the surprising adaptations earth's cold weather creatures have evolved to survive. This episode takes us to lands of freezing temperatures, scarce food and shortened daylight hours. Flourishing amidst ice and snow is one of nature's extreme challenges. At the southern tip of Chile we follow a lost Puma as she searches for her mother in a blizzard. In Finland a brown bear desperately searches for his last meal before entering hibernation for the approaching long, cold winter. In the vast national park of Yellowstone, a pack of wolves hound a herd of elk through the deep snow. And in the Carpathian Mountains of Romania, a Lynx uses his incredible eyesight to track down and kill even the smallest prey. For all animals winter brings unique challenges. But nature's toughest creatures have found incredible ways to survive in our planets coldest regions. Whether it's finding food, impressing a mate, or avoiding the worst of the weather these animals have evolved remarkable adaptations to outsmart the cold and succeed in the relentless struggle to survive.

programme.title: Polar Bear Family
programme.desc: The ultimate icons of polar wilderness, able to withstand the harshest environments and remain a top predator the lives of polar bears are nothing short of remarkable!

programme.title: Brazil: A Natural History
programme.desc: The largest rainforest in the world still holds many secrets. The harpy eagle is the world's biggest bird of prey, capable of hunting and killing monkeys. But the most important creatures in the forest are leaf-cutter ants ? they can harvest the green wealth of the forest, as they have found a way of removing the protective poisons from the leaves.

programme.title: Sri Lanka: Precious Isle
programme.desc: Join us on a journey to the most beautiful regions of Sri Lanka, in the company of a select group of individuals who inhabit this precious land.

programme.title: Epic Safari Encounters
programme.desc: Hosted by Rhino Safari Camp, the epic safari continues back in the Matusadona National Park where Kristina is guided by Steve. They explore the lake-shore, encounter the hungry local pride and Marula, the resident elephant, makes a lunch-time appearance.

programme.title: Epic Safari Encounters
programme.desc: Kristina travels to Gonarezhou National Park in the South-East of Zimbabwe. Thomas, her guide, takes her to the breath-taking Chilojo cliffs, tracks an impressive buffalo herd and keeps his cool as they experience heart-stopping elephant charges. Will Kristina finally spot her dream leopard?

programme.title: Wild Moments: Wild Moments: Wildlife Warriors
programme.desc: All over the world men and women fight for the protection of nature reserves and endangered species. This is their story, a story of bravery and stamina. We visit scientists in Central Europe who monitor the offspring of the rare lynx nearly 200 years after these elusive cats were extinct in the wild. We follow the work of the moose detective in Sweden on the island of Oland who tries to solve the riddle of increasing numbers of dead moose calves. In the heart of Africa one woman and her guards try to protect rare lowland gorillas and forest elephants but the increasing bush meat trade and the ongoing ivory smuggling makes their work extremely dangerous. Last but not least we meet US conservationists who rescue manatees in Florida - they have all dedicated their life to make a change. Without their work our world would be poorer.

programme.title: Namibia`s Desert Kingdom
programme.desc: Although the dunes are barren, the dry riverbeds show signs of growth. And out of the heat, vast shapes appear. A herd of desert elephants ambles along the dry riverbed sniffing the ground with their lazy trunks. These remarkable creatures can smell the water underground and know where to find it. An abandoned well attracts a troop of chacma baboons, followed by a small herd of oryx and springbok, and finally a group of jackals. None of them has seen the pride of desert lions lying in wait.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.desc: The two sisters are born as white as snow in May 2009 in South Africa's Kruger Park. Growing up in this vast, wild wilderness they must not only overcome the same survival challenges that all young lion cubs face, they must also overcome the threats their high visibility brings. In the African bush, anything unusual stands out and is often eliminated by eagle-eyed predators. Will our cubs survive? The odds are stacked against them – 80 percent of all newborn lion cubs don't make it to adulthood.

programme.title: White Lions: Born Wild: White Lions: Born Wild
programme.desc: ‘White Lions – Born Wild' is a true wildlife story, with strong characters and closely studied behaviour. We follow the cubs' progress as they embark on the pathway to adulthood, learning to hunt, learning to avoid danger, learning to live in their white coats. This is a strong behaviour-led film, a coming-of-age story of a very rare and unusual pair of lions. Through their eyes, we learn what it is really like to be a lion in Africa.

programme.title: Mantises
programme.desc: They are killers. They kill with unbelievable precision. They fight Kung Fu style and are seen in Japan as a symbol of vigilance - the mantises. Their triangular head with its unique flexibility is conspicuous. Two overdimensioned eyes fixate the distance to their prey rapidly and three-dimensionally. The chest segment of the mantis is prolonged and equipped with spiny appendages that can spear their prey as fast as a jack knife. The mysterious aura that surrounds the praying mantis has a lot to do with the fact that they are rarely seen. They have adapted to their surroundings perfectly. No matter whether leaves, blossoms, tree bark, sandy floors or even orchids - the mantis adjusts to all environments.

programme.title: Penguin City
programme.desc: In the middle of the Antarctic Ocean, an entire mountain range arises from the water: South Georgia, the nursery of the Antarctic. Hundreds of thousands of penguins, elephant seals, fur seals and their young overcrowd the beaches. The rough weather and the extremely difficult access to the island cause filmmaking to be an endeavor requiring much of the film crew around Roland Gockel and Rosie Koch and the state of the art cameras. A lot of patience and sensitivity over a period spanning some five years now offers unknown and poignant insights into the life of the King Penguins on South Georgia Island

programme.title: Predators of a Different Kind
programme.sub-title: In the World of the Unknown Sharks
programme.desc: With the aid of modern technology, reveal the unknown behaviour of some unusual species of shark: lemon sharks and their white-tip reef counterparts. Our film trip begins on the Bahamas. To be more precise: in the turquoise-blue waters of the Grand Bahama Bank, in an exactly fixed location. In the spring, 70 – 80 pregnant lemon sharks arrive here. This huge shark population was first discovered just a few years ago by shark researcher, Professor Sam Gruber. Many of the females are tired and rest on the seabed. Pregnant tiger sharks swim in the midst of this group. Without any protection whatsoever, our cameramen shoot their footage, surrounded by sharks and succeed in capturing images hitherto unseen. We continue our journey to Gainesville, Florida, to meet Gordon Hubbell, the leading shark denture expert with the world's largest shark denture collection. He knows everything about the evolutionary history of the lemon sharks, in addition to those of the white-tip reef variety off Cocos Island, Costa Rica. Here, we encounter large schools of fish, unprecedented numbers of stingrays, as well as hammerhead sharks. However, it is the white-tip reek sharks that make the biggest impression. Their performance begins late at night. Marauding, they patrol in large groups through the reefs and hunt everything that moves. Scales and dead prey fish float above the reef – a welcoming change of diet for the ubiquitous barracudas.

Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They're going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other's strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let's find out!

programme.title: SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
